synopsis.text: Tokyo University of the Arts' Department of Animation presents a captivating puppet animation, inspired by the legendary tale of Hagoromo, the heavenly feathered robe. In this enchanting story, an angel descends upon the serene Miho Beach to indulge in the tranquil waters of the sea. A curious fisherman, driven by intrigue, secretly takes the angel's feathered robe, only to be overcome with guilt and return it. The angel, overwhelmed with joy, ascends back to the heavens, leaving behind a mesmerizing dance in the sky. This heartwarming tale, brought to life by the talented first-year students of the Graduate School of Film and New Media, promises to leave you spellbound.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
